titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to William Stewart
CWG13783

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To William Stewart, Dr.

row.cell: To Services in organizing the militia of the State Kentucky for the month August 1864 by order of the Governor of Ky

body.p: Approved. And the Q. M. Genl is ordered to pay Same out of the militia fund
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D W Lindsey
Insp & adjt Genl Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 31st of August, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Eighty Three Dollars, and Thirty Three Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To William Stewart, Dr.

row.cell: To dervices rendered organizing the militia of Kentucky for the month of August 1864 ordered by the Governor

body.p: Approved And the Q. M. Genl is ordered to pay Same out of the militia fund
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

D W Lindsey
Insp & adjt Genl Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 31st of August, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Eighty Three Dollars, and Thirty Three Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. Abstract B Qr. 186.
William Stewart
Dollars 8333/100
Paid August 31st, 1864.
17
